summary: This bill, H.R. 228, proposes to amend the Internal Revenue Code to increase the tax deduction for eligible elementary and secondary school teachers' out-of-pocket classroom expenses. It would raise the deductible amount from $250 to $1,000. The bill also updates the provision for future inflation adjustments, establishing the new $1,000 amount as the baseline for years after 2025, indexed to inflation from calendar year 2024. The proposed changes would take effect for taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024, offering greater financial relief to educators.
